byline.contributor: Choe Sang-Hun contributed reporting from Seoul, South Korea.

lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have called for the arrest of Jay Y. Lee, the de facto head of Samsung, one of the country’s top companies.
snippet: Prosecutors have called for the arrest of Jay Y. Lee, the de facto head of Samsung, one of the country’s top companies....

headline.main: Political Crisis Engulfs Samsung, a Firm Tied to South Korea’s Success
headline.print_headline: Political Crisis Engulfs a Company Tied to South Korea’s Success
